#cam_pos_WF: Camera Position World Frame (WF). X,Y,Z, -> Z is up, X is right, Y is forward. (X-Y plane is ground plane)
#rpy_deg: rpy = roll pitch yaw in degrees. Camera Frame (CF): x is right, y is down, and z is forward
##rpy_deg: It is best to overestimate the height of the horizon (higher horizon means more feature points will be used for background registration)
